snippet: A Times sportswriter examines how the Academic Index, a measurement of an athlete's academic performance used by the Ivy League, is typically less relevant to a non-athlete applying to one of the eight Ivies.
abstract: A Times sportswriter examines how the Academic Index, a measurement of an athlete's academic performance used by the Ivy League, is typically less relevant to a non-athlete applying to one of the eight Ivies.

headline.main: A Rare Glimpse Inside the Ivy League's Academic Index
